XXbsu062_u:2545: tṛtīyaṃ me padaṃ kutra sthāpayethā tdaṃ vada //
XXbsu062_u:2552: iti satyaṃ mayā proktaṃ śrutvā sa saṃpraharṣitaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2562: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ śrutvā tīrthikaśāsanam //
XXbsu062_u:2564: mayā na śrūyate kvāpi jñāyate naivamuttamam //
XXbsu062_u:2568: sukṣatre dānasaṃbhūtaṃ naśrutaṃ na mataṃ mayā //
XXbsu062_u:2570: na jñātaṃ tattriratnānāṃ prābhajiṣyan sadā bhave //
XXbsu062_u:2578: satkṛtya śraddhayā gauṇyaṃ śrutvā bhajāni sarvadā //
XXbsu062_u:2579: tathā ya saṃgharatnānāṃ śaraṇe sarvadā sthitaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2597: tatkalaṃ śrīmahatsaukhyaṃ dadyān naiva tu saugatam //
XXbsu062_u:2599: dadasva śraddhayā dānaṃ bauddhaṃ padaṃ yadīcchasi //
XXbsu062_u:2600: evaṃ datvā sadā dānaṃ bodhicitto jitendriyaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2602: vrataṃ vinā na śudhyeta trikāyaṃ mahatāmapi /
XXbsu062_u:2607: kleśotthito jagadduṣṭaḥ kradho hanti kṣaṇena tat //
XXbsu062_u:2614: na hi vīryaṃ vinākāryaṃ sidhyate sudhiyāmapi /
XXbsu062_u:2625: vijñāya tvaṃ sadā sattvahitārthe cara sadvratam //
XXbsu062_u:2632: iti tena jagacchāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2634: tataḥ sa balirālokya taṃ lokeśaṃ jinātjam /
XXbsu062_u:2641: dharmaratnaṃ ca saṃghāṃśca śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi sarvadā //
XXbsu062_u:2643: dharmeṃ śrutvā ca saṃghānāṃ dāsye yathārhaṃ bhojanam //
XXbsu062_u:2647: saddharmaratnasya ca nirmalāsya buddhātmajānāṃ ca guṇākarāṇām //
XXbsu062_u:2649: yāvanti puṣpāṇi falāni cauvaṃ bhaiṣajyajātāni ca yānio santi /
XXbsu062_u:2650: ratnāni yāvanti ca santi loke jalāni ca svacchamanoramāṇi //
XXbsu062_u:2653: devādilokeṣu ca gandhadhūpāḥ kalpadrumā ratnamayāśca vṛkṣāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2660: ato mamārthaya parārthacintā gṛṇantu nāthā idamātmaśaktyā //
XXbsu062_u:2661: dadāmi cātmānamahaṃ jinebhyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ ca tadātmajebhyaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2662: parigrahaṃ me kurutāgrasattvā yuṣmāsu dāsatvamupaimi bhaktyā //
XXbsu062_u:2664: pūrvaṃ ca pāpaṃ samatikramāmi nānyacca pāpaṃ prakaromi bhūyaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2681: yanmayā paśunā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritameva vā //
XXbsu062_u:2694: apriyā na bhaviṣyanti bhaviṣyanti na me priyāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2695: ahaṃ ca na bhaviṣyāmi sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyati //
XXbsu062_u:2708: puṇyamekaṃ tadā trāṇaṃ mayā tatraiva saṃcitam //
XXbsu062_u:2718: tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tasmin sthāne mahābhaye //
XXbsu062_u:2729: adyaiva maraṇaṃ naiti na yukta me sukhāsikā /
XXbsu062_u:2730: avaśyaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi kasmānme susthinaṃ manaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2734: ekākī kvāpi yāsyāmi kiṃ me sarvaiḥ priyāpriyaiḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2736: iyameva tu me cintā yuktā rātraṃdivaṃ sadā /
XXbsu062_u:2738: mayā duṣṭena mūḍhena yatpāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ purā /
XXbsu062_u:2753: ityukte balinā tena lokeśvaro niśamya niśamya saḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2754: sādhu sādhviti saṃrādhya taṃ baliṃ caivamabravīt //
XXbsu062_u:2756: yadi nātra vicintyate hitaṃ punarapyeṣa samāgamaḥ kutaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2757: rātrau yathā meghaghanāndhakāre vidyutkṣaṇaṃ darśayati prakāśam /
XXbsu062_u:2758: buddhānubhāvena tathā kadācillokasya puṇyeṣu matiḥkṣaṇaṃ syāt //
XXbsu062_u:2759: tasmācchubhaṃ durbalameva nityaṃ balaṃ tu pāpasya mahatsughoram /
XXbsu062_u:2760: tajjīyate 'yena śubhena kena saṃbodhicittaṃ yadi nāma na syāt //
XXbsu062_u:2765: bahusaukhyaśatāni bhoktukāmairna vimocyaṃ hi sadaiva bodhicittam //
XXbsu062_u:2766: bhavacārakabandhano varo kaḥ sugatānāṃ suta ucyate kṣaṇena /
XXbsu062_u:2772: kadalīva falaṃ vihāya yāti kṣayamanyatkuśalaṃ hi sarvameva /
XXbsu062_u:2773: satataṃ falati kṣayaṃ na yāti prasavatyeva hi bodhicittavṛkṣaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2796: tṛptaṃ sarvasukhaiḥ kuryāt sarvāḥ pīḍāśchinatti ca //
XXbsu062_u:2798: kuto vā tādṛśaṃ mitraṃ puṇyaṃ vā tādṛśaṃ kutaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2801: iti mantrayatau jinasya putre kaluṣaṃ svahṛdaye karoti yaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2803: atha yasya manaḥ prasādameti prasavettasya tato 'dhikaṃ falam //
XXbsu062_u:2807: nādya cet kriyate yatnaṃ talenāpi talaṃ vrajeḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2809: eatān sarvān visaṃvādya kā gatiste bhaviṣyati //
XXbsu062_u:2810: manasā cintayitvā tu yo na dadyāt punarnaraḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2816: ekasyāpi hi sattvasya hitaṃ hitvā hato bhavet /
XXbsu062_u:2823: yadā kuśalayogyo 'pi kuśalaṃ tvaṃ karoṣi na /
XXbsu062_u:2829: yadīdṛśaṃ kṣaṇaṃ prāpya punaḥ sīdasi mohitaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2831: ciraṃ dhakṣyati te kāyam nārakāgni suduḥsahaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2834: na śurā naiva te prājñāḥ kathaṃ dāsīkṛto 'si taiḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2836: atra te cetanā nāsti mantrairiva vimohitaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2837: sarve devā manuṣyāśca yadi syustava śatravaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2842: mativeśmani lobhayan jale yadi tiṣṭhanti kuta sukhaṃ tava //
XXbsu062_u:2844: mahārthasiddhyai tu samudyatasya duḥkhāni kasmāttava bādhakāni //
XXbsu062_u:2846: śītātapādivyasanaṃ sahante jagaddhitārtham sahase kathaṃ na //
XXbsu062_u:2850: ye mocayanti bandhāttvāṃ dveṣasteṣu katham tava //
XXbsu062_u:2852: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate //
XXbsu062_u:2861: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate //
XXbsu062_u:2870: mithyā kalpanayā citte pāpāt kāye vyathā yataḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2873: na kṛtā śāsane kārā daridrāśā na pūritā //
XXbsu062_u:2874: bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattamārtā na sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2890: anyacca kāryaṃ kālaṃ ca hīnaṃ tattanasādhitam //
XXbsu062_u:2896: māni śatruṃ vaśaṃ neti mānaśatruvaśāstu te //
XXbsu062_u:2897: mānena durgatiṃ nītā mūrkhā durdarśanāḥ kṛśāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2899: te mānino vijayinaśca ta eva śūrāḥ ye mānaśatruvijayāya vahanti mānam /
XXbsu062_u:2900: ye taṃ sphurantamapi mānaripuṃ nihatya kāmaṃ jane jayafalaṃ pratipādayanti
XXbsu062_u:2904: yena janmasahasrāṇi draṣṭavyo na punaḥ priyaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2905: avaśyaṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti samādhau na ca tiṣṭhati /
XXbsu062_u:2906: naca tṛpyati dṛṣṭvāpi pūrvad bādhyate tṛṣā //
XXbsu062_u:2911: bālaiḥ sa bhāgacarito niyataṃ yāti durgatim /
XXbsu062_u:2916: hitamuktāḥ prakupyanti vārayanti ca te hitāt /
XXbsu062_u:2917: atha na śrūyate teṣāṃ kupitā yānti durgatim //
XXbsu062_u:2922: tasmāt prājño na tāmicchedicchāto jāyate bhayam /
XXbsu062_u:2929: na ca pāpamakīrttirvā yadarthaṃ gaṇitā purā //
XXbsu062_u:2933: prakāmaṃ saṃpariṣvajya kiṃ na gacchati nirvṛtim //
XXbsu062_u:2936: yadi na te 'śucau rāgaḥ kasmādāliṃgase param /
XXbsu062_u:2948: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirupyatām //
XXbsu062_u:2951: evaṃ śūnyeṣu bhāveṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet /
XXbsu062_u:2952: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati //
XXbsu062_u:2953: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam /
XXbsu062_u:2954: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamānā svabhāvataḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2955: vicāre jīvaloke hi ko nāmātra mariṣyate /
XXbsu062_u:2956: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt //
XXbsu062_u:2978: snātvā snātvā yathā kaścidviśed vahniṃ muhurmuhuḥ /
XXbsu062_u:2990: yasyaiva śravaṇāt trāsastaireva na vinā ratiḥ //
XXbsu062_u:2991: ātmānaṃ ca parāṃścaiva yaḥ śīghra trātumicchati /
XXbsu062_u:3002: yadi dāsyāmi kiṃ bhojye ityātmārthe piśācatā /
XXbsu062_u:3010: ye kecidduġkhitā loke sarve te svasukhecchayā /
XXbsu062_u:3014: na nāmasādhyaṃ buddhatvaṃ saṃsāre 'pi kutaḥ sukham /
XXbsu062_u:3016: āstām tāvatparo loko dṛṣṭo 'pyartho na sidhyati /
XXbsu062_u:3020: upadravā ye ca bhavanti loke yāvanti duḥkhāni bhayāni caiva /
XXbsu062_u:3031: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3033: manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśrūte /
XXbsu062_u:3034: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ dvesaśalye hṛdi sthite //
XXbsu062_u:3039: na dviṣantaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti durjanā gaganopamāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3042: dahatyātmānamevādau paraṃ dhakṣyati vā na vā //
XXbsu062_u:3046: kodhaṃ yo hanti nirbandhāt sa sukhīha paratra ca //
XXbsu062_u:3050: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim //
XXbsu062_u:3056: īdṛśāḥ prayayā asyetyevaṃ matvā sukhī bhava //
XXbsu062_u:3058: yena yāsyanti narakān tvayaiva te hatā nanu //
XXbsu062_u:3060: etānāśritya te pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamatā bahu /
XXbsu062_u:3064: evaṃ budhvā tu sattveṣu kṣāntiṃ dhṛtvā śubhe cara /
XXbsu062_u:3067: na balārthaṃ na cārogyena ca kāyasukhāya te /
XXbsu062_u:3074: puṇye vighnaḥ kṛto 'nenetyatra ko yo na yujyate /
XXbsu062_u:3075: kṣāntyā samaṃ tapo nāsti na tvetattadupasthitam //
XXbsu062_u:3079: na ca prāvrājake prāpte pravrajya bighna ucyate //
XXbsu062_u:3092: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:3098: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam //
XXbsu062_u:3103: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrā yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ ca praviśanti manyum /
XXbsu062_u:3107: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ kṛpātmabhirnaiva hi saṃśayo 'sti /
XXbsu062_u:3108: dṛśyante ete nanu sattvarupāsta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro 'tra //
XXbsu062_u:3115: evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīryaṃ bodhiryataḥ sthitā /
XXbsu062_u:3116: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vina gatiḥ //
XXbsu062_u:3119: naivāsti tajjagati vastu vicintyamānaṃ nāpnuyādyadiha vīryarathādhiruḍhaḥ
XXbsu062_u:3121: hatvā ripūn jayamanuttamamāpnuvanti viṣṇurjitaṃ tadaha vīryamahāhaṭasya //
XXbsu062_u:3128: yaddevo viyati vimānbavāsino ye nirdvandvāḥ samanubhavanti saumanasyam /
XXbsu062_u:3131: bodhyaṃgadānaṃ pradiśanti sadbhyo dhyānaṃ hi tatra pravadanti hetum //
XXbsu062_u:3134: prajñādhanena vikalaṃ tu narasya rupamālekhya rupamiva sāravihīnamantaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3137: jñānālokaṃ karoti praharati ca sadā doṣavṛndaṃ narāṇām //
XXbsu062_u:3138: ādeṣṭya cendriyāṇāṃ paramanujamano vetti sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3140: kāryārṇave vāpi dṛḍhaṃ nimagnāḥ saṃgrāmamadhye manujāḥ pradhānāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3141: prajñāvaśātte vijayaṃ labhante prajñā hyataḥ sā śubhahetubhūtā //
XXbsu062_u:3143: na prajñā vikalā vibhānti puruṣāḥ prātāḥpradīpā iva //
XXbsu062_u:3144: svargāpavargaguṇaratnanidhānabhūtā etāḥ ṣaḍeva bhuvi pāramitā narāṇām /
XXbsu062_u:3145: jñātvā bhavasva hitasādhanatatparastvaṃ kuryā ataḥ satatameva śubhe prayatnam //
XXbsu062_u:3151: yā avasthāḥ prapadyante svayaṃ paravaśo 'pi vā /
XXbsu062_u:3152: tāsvavasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ //
XXbsu062_u:3153: na hī tadvidyate kiṃcidyanna śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3154: na tadasti na yatpuṇyamevaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ //
XXbsu062_u:3161: ākṛtaṃ kiṃ mayā nātha yajñaṃ tīrthikasammatam /
XXbsu062_u:3162: yasyeha falaṃ bhuṃjāno vasāmyatra janaiḥ saha //
XXbsu062_u:3176: evaṃ stutvā sa daityendro lokanāthaṃ tamīśvaram /
XXbsu062_u:3178: rakṣa māṃ durmatiṃ nātha samuddhara bhavodadheḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3183: kṛtāṃjaliḥ sadā smṛtvā namāmi śaraṇe sthitaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:3184: yacca dharmaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ samādiṣṭaṃ jagaddhite /
XXbsu062_u:3187: tānapyahaṃ sadā smṛtvā bhajāni śaraṇe sthitaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:3188: evaṃ tadbhajanaṃ kṛtvā yanmayā sādhitaṃ śubham /
XXbsu062_u:3190: glānānāmasmi bhaiajyaṃ bhaveyaṃ vaidya eva ca /
XXbsu062_u:3198: sarvatyāgaśca nirvāṇaṃ nirvānārthi ca me manaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3199: tyaktavyaṃ cenmayā sarvaṃ varaṃ sattveṣu dīyate //
XXbsu062_u:3201: ghnantu nindantu vā nityamākirantu ca pāṃśubhiḥ //
XXbsu062_u:3202: krīḍantu mama kāyena hasantu vilasantu ca /
XXbsu062_u:3205: kārayantu ca karmāṇi yāni teṣāṃ sukhāvahe /
XXbsu062_u:3207: yeṣāṃ kruddhā prasannā vā māmālambya matirbhavet /
XXbsu062_u:3208: sa eva teṣāṃ hetuḥ syānnityaṃ sarvārthasiddhaye //
XXbsu062_u:3209: atyākhyāsyanti māṃ ye ca ye cānye 'pyapakāriṇaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3212: pārepsunāṃ ca naubhūtaḥ setuḥ saṃkrama eva ca //
XXbsu062_u:3224: tadvadeva ca tāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣisyāmi yathākramam //
XXbsu062_u:3225: adya me safalaṃ janma sulabdhāḥ sārasaṃpadaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3242: jagadadya mayā nimantritaṃ sugatatvena sukhena cāntarā /
XXbsu062_u:3246: ārādhanā yādya tathāgatānāṃ sarvātmana dāsamupaimi loke /
XXbsu062_u:3247: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughā nighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:3248: tvāmevāhamṛṣiṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ prāṇairapi prāṇinām ekaṃ bāndhavamekeva suhadaṃ śāstāramekaṃ gurum /
XXbsu062_u:3249: trānaṃ traibhuvārttigahvaradarīvyāvarttināṃ prāṇinām ācāryaṃ paramarthatattvaviṣaye bhūtārthanāthaṃ vibhum //
XXbsu062_u:3251: ko vā tvaṃ praṇipatya sāndrakaruṇāṃ prahlāditādhyāśayaṃ tīvrāpāyavatīṃ viṣādanakarīṃ tīrṇāṃ na duḥkhāpagām //
XXbsu062_u:3252: svābhiprāyamato bravīmi sakalaṃ saṃsāramapyutsahe vastuṃ bhīmabhayānake lokeśvarālaṃkṛte /
XXbsu062_u:3253: na tvevaikapi kṣaṇaṃ surapure saṃbuddhaśūnye jagaty udvṛttakṣatavṛttarākṣasagaṇavyāluptapuṇyotsave
XXbsu062_u:3254: tadyāvanna patati sarva eva loko durdṛṣṭivratavivṛte pramādakūpe sarvajñapravacanabhāskare gate 'staṃ tattāvadvacanarasāyanairniṣevyam /
XXbsu062_u:3256: pāpābhyāsakalaṃkitānyapi yataḥ kalyāṇamitrāśrayāt toyānīva ghanātyaye vimalatāṃ cetāṃsi gacchantyataḥ
XXbsu062_u:3257: samyak mitrasamāgamotsavasukhānyāśritya tasmātsadā sevyāḥ satpuruṣā niratyayaguṇaśrīsampadaṃ vāṃchatā /
XXbsu062_u:3258: evaṃ viniścitya karomi yatnaṃ yathoktaśikṣāpratipattihetoḥ vaidyopadeśāccalataḥ kuto 'sti bhaiṣajyasādhyasya nirāmayatvam //
XXbsu062_u:3264: na śikṣā rakṣituṃ śakyā calaṃ cittamarakṣatā //
XXbsu062_u:3265: adāntā mattamātaṃgā na kurvantīha tāṃ vyathām /
XXbsu062_u:3269: vyāghrāḥ sihāṃ gajā ṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ sarve ca śatravaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3276: cittādeva hi sarvatra bhayaṃ bhadraṃ ca jāyate //
XXbsu062_u:3278: taptāyaḥkuṭṭimaṃ kena kuto jātāśca tā striyaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:3285: dānapāramitā proktā tasmāt sā cittameva hi //
XXbsu062_u:3290: bhūmiṃ chādayituṃ sarvāṃ kutaḥ carma bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu062_u:3292: bāhyā bhāvāstathā sarvā na śakyā vārayituṃ kvacit /
XXbsu062_u:3298: duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ bhramanti te mudhāmbare /
XXbsu062_u:3304: lābhā naśyantu te kāmaṃ satkāraḥ kāyajīvitam /
XXbsu062_u:3305: naśyatvanyacca kuśalaṃ mā tu cittaṃ kadācana //
XXbsu062_u:3347: pramātuṃ śakyate naiva mayaikena kathaṃ khalu //
XXbsu062_u:3350: yadyevaṃ carase rājan kvāpi na durgatiṃ vrajeḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3352: svaparātmahitaṃ kṛtvā bhuktvā saukhyaṃ sadā bhaveḥ /
XXbsu062_u:3422: mayā te hitamākhyātaṃ budhvā dhartuṃ yadīcchasi //

XXbsu062_u:4430: evaṃ ca mānavā duṣṭāḥ pāpiṣṭhā api yatnataḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4438: bhavatāṃ darśanaṃ prāpya sāfalyaṃ me pariśramam /
XXbsu062_u:4442: iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sa saṃpraharṣitaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4444: aho īdṛkmahābhijñaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ na kasyacit /
XXbsu062_u:4448: mā tvaṃ śrānto 'si lokeśa kaccitte kauśalaṃ tanau /

XXbsu062_u:4450: ityevaṃ tena saṃpṛṣṭe lokeśvaro niśamya te /
XXbsu062_u:4452: nātrāhaṃ bhavatāṃ madhye śrāntaḥ kliṣṭo 'pi vā care /
XXbsu062_u:4461: nāhaṃ sadeha tiṣṭheyaṃ sarvatrāpi careya hi /
XXbsu062_u:4474: maṃgalaṃ ca sadā bhūyāt saṃbodhiśrīḥ samṛddhyatu //

XXbsu062_u:4513: dṛṣṭaṃ cāpi tathā tasya lokeśasya jagatprabhoḥ /

XXbsu062_u:4519: durgatiṃ te na gacchanti kadācana kvacidbhave /
XXbsu062_u:4522: sadā loke śubhaṃ kṛtvā prānte yāyuḥ sukhāvatīm //
XXbsu062_u:4543: daridrān durbhagān dīnān dhaninaḥ subhagān sataḥ //
XXbsu062_u:4553: yena sa sahasoddhṛtya yojayati śubhe jagat //
XXbsu062_u:4558: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4561: yaiḥ sa sattvān samuddhṛtya preṣayati sukhāvatīm //
XXbsu062_u:4575: tena tasya bhaye duḥkhe rakṣā na kriyate kvacit /
XXbsu062_u:4592: mānayan sakalāṃllokān bhṛtyān dāsān ca toṣayan //
XXbsu062_u:4610: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā siṃhalaḥ sa vicakṣaṇaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4615: sadā ratnākare gatvā so dhayati susaṃpade //
XXbsu062_u:4618: piturdravyaṃ samādāya datvārthibhyo na te falam /
XXbsu062_u:4632: bhavatāṃ yadi vāṃchāsti prāgacchantu mayā saha //
XXbsu062_u:4637: iti taiḥ saha saṃbhāṣya sa siṃhalaḥ samunmanāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4641: iti putroditaṃ śrutvā siṃhaḥ saḥ sārthabhṛtpitā /
XXbsu062_u:4643: putra śṛṇu hitaṃ vākyaṃ mayoditaṃ tvayātmaja /
XXbsu062_u:4649: tatraiva ca mahāmbhodhau tāvanmā vrajathāḥ kvacit /
XXbsu062_u:4650: mṛte 'pi mayi tatrābdhau gantuṃ neha kadācana //
XXbsu062_u:4651: yāvaddravye gṛhe pūrṇe tāvanmā gāḥ kuhāpi ca /
XXbsu062_u:4652: yadā kṣīṇe gṛhe dravyaṃ tadāpi svagṛhe 'rjaya //
XXbsu062_u:4654: gantuṃ naivābhivāchāṃ te bhavedvāṃchāsti te yadi //
XXbsu062_u:4657: kleśinā hi sadā duḥkhaṃ saṃsāre sukhatā kutaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:4663: yathākāmaṃ svayaṃ bhuktvā yāvajjīvaṃ sukhaṃ cara //
XXbsu062_u:4686: iti vijñāya me tāta hyanujñāṃ dātumarhati //
XXbsu062_u:4699: yadyanujñāṃ dadāsi na viyogo nau bhaveddhruvam /
XXbsu062_u:4701: iti putroditaṃ śrutvā siṃhaḥ pitā sa bodhitaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4704: tava nirbandhitaṃ citāṃ vārayituṃ na śakyate //
XXbsu062_u:4709: sidhyatu te visaṃyātrā bhūyāt sarvatra maṃgalam /
XXbsu062_u:4714: tadā mātā samāliṃgya siṃhalaṃ taṃ priyātmajam /

XXbsu062_u:4718: hā jivananandano me 'si vallabho hi na cāparaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4719: hā prāṇa mātāri snehaḥ kathaṃ te vidyate na hi //
XXbsu062_u:4726: idānīṃ tvaṃ yuvā bhūtvā kathaṃ māṃ tyaktumicchasi /
XXbsu062_u:4727: putraḥ svāṃ mātaraṃ vṛddhāṃ rakṣadeva tyajenna tu //
XXbsu062_u:4729: hā putra kathaṃ me ko māṃ jīrṇitāṃ tyaktumarhati //
XXbsu062_u:4731: yathākāmaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā saṃcarasva gṛhe raman //
XXbsu062_u:4732: mṛtāyāṃ mayi te putra yatrecchā vartate tadā /
XXbsu062_u:4734: iti mātroditaṃ śrutvā siṃhalaḥ sa vinoditaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4736: mā rautsīḥ kiṃ viṣādaṃ te dhairyamālambya mā śucaḥ /

XXbsu062_u:4752: pitrā saha sukhaṃ bhuktvā pālayantī gṛhe vasa //
XXbsu062_u:4754: vimucaṃ mā viṣādaṃ ca prasīdāhaṃ vrajāni hi //
XXbsu062_u:4760: tathā ratnākare tena saha gantuṃ samīcchire //
XXbsu062_u:4767: iti taiḥ prārthite sarvaiḥ sa siṃhalo mahāmatiḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4769: bho bhavantaḥ samicchanti yadyāgantuṃ mayā saha /
XXbsu062_u:4772: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te saṃpraharṣitāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4773: sahasā svasvagṛhaṃ gatvā jñātīn sarvān vinodayan //
XXbsu062_u:4777: pitroḥ pādān praṇatvā ca paṇyamādāya prasthitaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:4778: tatra tān vaṇijaḥ sarvān dṛṣṭavā sa samupācaran /
XXbsu062_u:4796: atha te vaṇijaḥ sarve samīkṣya taṃ mahāmbudhim /
XXbsu062_u:4805: ityevaṃ prārthitaṃ sarvaiḥ karṇadhāro niśamya saḥ /

XXbsu062_u:4817: iti saṃprārthya natvā tamambhodhiṃ taraṇiṃ ca tām /
XXbsu062_u:4818: nāvikaḥ sa samāruhya prācārayan śanaiḥ kramāt //
XXbsu062_u:4819: tataḥ saṃcāritā sā nau sadā gatisamīritā /
XXbsu062_u:4825: kutra gantuṃ samīhā vo vātā vānti mahājavāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4828: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te trasitāśayāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4835: tataḥ sa karṇadhāro 'pi saṃprārthya taṃ mahodadhim /
XXbsu062_u:4839: tataste vāyavaḥ śāntā naukā saṃcaritā kramāt /
XXbsu062_u:4845: tairāśu prahatā sā nau bhrāmyamānā pralolitā /
XXbsu062_u:4849: tadā sa sihaṃlo dṛṣṭvā taraṇiṃ tāṃ vibhinnitām /
XXbsu062_u:4851: bhavantaḥ kiṃ viṣādena daiva eva gatirbhavet /
XXbsu062_u:4854: dravyaiḥ sārdhaṃ vayaṃ sarve patitā nidhanaṃ gatāḥ //
XXbsu062_u:4860: sa eva siṃhalaḥ smṛtvā triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4866: tatra te vaṇijaḥ sarve nimagnānyapi daivataḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4874: ityevaṃ kathitaṃ tābhiḥ śrutvā te vaṇijastataḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4876: tatra viśramya te sarve saṃnirīkṣya parasparam /
XXbsu062_u:4879: ka iha sāmprataṃ trātā hitārthī sadgatirbhavet //
XXbsu062_u:4880: iti taiḥ kathitaṃ śrutvā sārthavāhaḥ sa siṃhalaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4883: dharma eva bhavet trātā sarvatrāpi suhṛdgatiḥ //
XXbsu062_u:4890: dharma eva hi sarvatra trātā bhartā suhṛdgatiḥ //
XXbsu062_u:4893: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te paribodhitāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4895: sa eva siṃhalaḥ smṛtvā triratnasya samāhitaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4899: vaiṣādyaṃ vaḥ kimatrāpi naiva cintyo hi duḥkhatā /
XXbsu062_u:4901: asmākaṃ svāmino naiva gatirvāpi na kaścana /
XXbsu062_u:4910: tadatra kiṃ viṣādaṃ vaḥ saṃramadhvaṃ yathecchayā /
XXbsu062_u:4914: tatastāḥ pramadāḥ sarvān matvā tān kāmamohitān /
XXbsu062_u:4916: tāsāṃ vṛddhāpi yā kāntā sā dṛṣṭvā samupāsṛtā /
XXbsu062_u:4919: atha tāḥ pramadāḥ sarvān svān svāṃstān svāmino mudā /
XXbsu062_u:4923: evaṃ te vaṇijaḥ sarve bhuktvā bhojyaṃ yathepsitam /
XXbsu062_u:4925: evaṃ bhuktvā yathākāmaṃ ramitvā te divāniśam /
XXbsu062_u:4934: evaṃ hi hasito dīpo dṛṣṭo naiva śruto 'pi na //
XXbsu062_u:4935: iti dhyātvā ciraṃ paśyan siṃhalaḥ sa samutthitaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4937: kimarthaṃ hasase dīpa tadatra me samādiśa /
XXbsu062_u:4938: ko 'tra dīpe praviṣṭo hi mayā na jñāyate bhavān //
XXbsu062_u:4941: siṃhala kiṃ na jānāsi rākṣasīyaṃ na mānuṣī /
XXbsu062_u:4943: sarvāstāḥ pramadāḥ kāntā rākṣasyo naiva mānavāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4945: iti dīpasamākhyāutaṃ śrutvā bhītaḥ sa siṃhalaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4950: iti saṃprārthite tena sa pradīpaḥ punarhasan /
XXbsu062_u:4959: satyaṃ vā yadi vā 'satyaṃ śraddadhyā me vacastadā //
XXbsu062_u:4963: kṛtvā candraprabhaṃ khaḍgaṃ dhṛtvā saṃprasthito drutam //
XXbsu062_u:4964: tato gacchan sa ekākī niśīye saṃvilokayan /
XXbsu062_u:4972: bhavantaḥ ke kiyanto 'tra prakṣiptāḥ kena niśritāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:4989: mā bhaiṣṭa kiṃ viṣādaṃ vā dhairyamālambya tiṣṭhata /
XXbsu062_u:4990: sarvāsāmapi hyasmākaṃ kaścit svāmī na vidyate //
XXbsu062_u:4999: iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā te 'pi vaṇigjanāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5000: sarve svakaṃ pravṛttāntaṃ kathitvā taṃ vyanodayan //
XXbsu062_u:5002: tadatra ratisaṃraktā mā tiṣṭhāśu vraja svaṃ puram //
XXbsu062_u:5007: vinodya svavaśe sthāpya saṃcāritāḥ sukhe sadā //
XXbsu062_u:5016: yadītaḥ sahasā yūyaṃ sarve gacchata sāṃpratam /
XXbsu062_u:5017: kuśalaṃ vā bhavennaivaṃ yadi sarve vinakṣyatha //
XXbsu062_u:5019: avatīrya drutaṃ vṛkṣāt sahasā svālayaṃ yayau //
XXbsu062_u:5020: tatra ratikaraṃ dīpamuddīptaṃ taṃ samīkṣya saḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5022: taṃ purasthaṃ samālokya pradīpaḥ sa samujjvalan /
XXbsu062_u:5024: iti dīpoditaṃ śrutvā punarāha sa vismitaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5025: sarvaṃ satyaṃ mayā dṛṣṭamādiṣṭaṃ bhavatā yathā //
XXbsu062_u:5028: iti saṃprārthite tena sa pradīpaḥ samujjvalan /
XXbsu062_u:5035: sa śvetā auṣadhīrbhuktvā prāvartya parivartya ca /
XXbsu062_u:5037: ka ito 'bdhiṃ samuttirya gantumicchanti ye punaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5038: svadeśaṃ me samāruhya pṛṣṭhe tiṣṭhantu te dṛḍham //
XXbsu062_u:5043: tataḥ so 'śvo mahābhijñaḥ sarvān yuṣmānito drutam /
XXbsu062_u:5053: iti tāṃ mithyayā kāntāṃ bodhiyitvāpi śaṃkitaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5055: tataḥ sa prātarutthāya sarvāṃstān vaṇijaḥ sattvān /
XXbsu062_u:5057: tathā te vaṇijaścāpi sarve tatra samāśritāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5076: īdṛk mahattaraṃ saukhyaṃ manye svarge 'pi durlabham //
XXbsu062_u:5093: aho bhāgyaṃ tadasmākaṃ yadiha preṣitā vayam /
XXbsu062_u:5098: svadeśe 'pi purnagatvā kiṃ kiṃ bhokṣyāmahe sukham //
XXbsu062_u:5102: hitvā gatcā svadeśe 'pi kiṃ sthitvā svajanaiḥ saha //
XXbsu062_u:5103: dhanyāste puruṣā martyāḥ kāntābhirye sadā ratāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5108: kiṃ lapsyāmaha etādṛk mahatsaukhyaṃ kadā katham //
XXbsu062_u:5109: ityevaṃ taiḥ samākhyātaṃ sarvairapi niśamya saḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5112: yadi bhadre 'sti vāṃchā vaḥ tatkurudhvaṃ yathoditam //
XXbsu062_u:5113: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te vismatāśayāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5115: kiṃ vākyaṃ samupākhyāhi yadi bhadre samīhasi /
XXbsu062_u:5117: iti taiḥ kathitaṃ sarvaiḥ śrutvā sa siṃhalaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5119: sarvaiḥ satya samādhāya samayaṃ dhāsyate yadi /
XXbsu062_u:5124: etattaiḥ kathite sarvaiḥ sārthavāhaḥ sa siṃhalaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5129: tadā sarve vayaṃ hyatra vrajema nidhanaṃ khalu //
XXbsu062_u:5134: iti sarvai samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sa siṃhalaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5137: imā hi pramadāḥ sarvā rākṣasyo naiva mānuṣāḥ //
XXbsu062_u:5138: iti satyaṃ mayākhyātaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi bodhitāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5140: iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sarve vaṇigjanāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5144: sārthavāha kathaṃ jñātaṃ kutra dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ tvayā /
XXbsu062_u:5145: etāḥ kāntā na mānuṣyo rākṣasya iti tadvada //
XXbsu062_u:5146: yadyetā naiva mānuṣyo rākṣasya eva tatkatham /
XXbsu062_u:5147: asmākaṃ ka iha trātā gatirvā syātparāyaṇaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:5151: iti taiḥ kathitaṃ śrutvā sārthavāhaḥ sa siṃhalaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5153: satyameva mṛṣā naiva tathāpi mā viṣīdata /
XXbsu062_u:5156: sthitaḥ sattvānukampārthaṃ sa naḥ trātā gatirbhavet //
XXbsu062_u:5159: tatra gatvā vayaṃ sarva upasarema vanditum /
XXbsu062_u:5162: ko 'tra pāramito gantuṃ icchantīti vadet tridhā //
XXbsu062_u:5163: tadā sarve vayaṃ natvā tamevaṃ prārthayemahi /
XXbsu062_u:5164: icchāmahe ito gantuṃ pāraṃ tatsahasā naya //
XXbsu062_u:5167: sa evāsmākamiha trātā gatirnānyo hi vidyate /
XXbsu062_u:5173: iti sneho 'sti jīve vo dhṛtvaitatsamayaṃ dṛḍham /
XXbsu062_u:5175: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te vaṇigjanāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5188: tatra tāḥ pramadāḥ kāntā dṛṣṭvā tān svagṛhāgatān /
XXbsu062_u:5191: satyametat samākhyāhi yadi sneho 'sti te mayi //
XXbsu062_u:5192: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te vaṇigjanāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5194: etacchrutvā ca tāḥ kāntāḥ sarvāḥ svaṃ svaṃ priyaṃ mudā /
XXbsu062_u:5196: dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ mahadudyānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vāpi sarovaram /
XXbsu062_u:5198: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te vaṇigjanāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5200: tacchrutvā pramadāḥ sarvāḥ samīkṣya tā svakaṃ priyam /
XXbsu062_u:5204: aho yūyaṃ gatāḥ kutra dṛśyante na kathaṃ khalu /
XXbsu062_u:5206: etacchrutvāpi te sarve vaṇijaḥ svasvapriyāṃ prati /
XXbsu062_u:5210: sarvānapi tarun drṣṭuṃ gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ priye //
XXbsu062_u:5211: tāni sarvāṇi saṃvīkṣya gṛhītvāpi falāni ca /
XXbsu062_u:5213: tacchrutvā tāstathetyuktvā sarvāḥ svaṃ svaṃ ptriyaṃ mudā /
XXbsu062_u:5215: bhuktvā te 'pi yathākāmaṃ sarvaiḥ saṃtoṣitā apio /
XXbsu062_u:5223: kiṃ svadeśasmṛtiṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ bhuktveha tiṣṭhata /
XXbsu062_u:5225: dravyāṇyapi ca sarvāṇi bhogyāni vividhāni ca /
XXbsu062_u:5235: nātra kiṃcidviṣādatvaṃ bhayaṃ cāpi na kiṃcana //
XXbsu062_u:5236: yathākāmaṃ prabhuktvaiva rama caran sukhaṃ vasa //
XXbsu062_u:5238: iti tābhiḥ samākhyātaṃ sarve 'pi te vaṇigjanāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5240: tatastāḥ pramadāḥ sarvā rātro svasvapriyaiḥ saha /
XXbsu062_u:5244: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya sarve 'pi te vaṇigjanāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5252: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya sarve te siṃhalādayaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5253: svāṃ svāṃ bhāryāṃ samāmantrya gṛhītvā svasvasaṃvaram //
XXbsu062_u:5256: tatra sa siṃhalaḥ sarvān vaṇījastān vilokayan /
XXbsu062_u:5264: kenāpi smaraṇīyā na bharyā kāntā priyā api /
XXbsu062_u:5267: iti kṛtvā kriyābandhaṃ sarve te siṃhalādayaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5268: tataḥ saṃprasthitāḥ śīghraṃ tīraṃ prāpto mahodadheḥ //
XXbsu062_u:5271: tatra tān samupayātān dṛṣṭvā so 'śvaḥ samutthitaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5275: deva sarve vayaṃ pāraṃ gantumicchāmahe khalu /
XXbsu062_u:5277: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā so 'śvarājo dayānidhiḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5279: yadi pāramito gantuṃ yūyaṃ sarve samicchatha /
XXbsu062_u:5281: yāvatra choditaṃ kāyaṃ mayā tāvatra kenacit /
XXbsu062_u:5283: iti tena samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa siṃhalāgrataḥ /
XXbsu062_u:5285: tataste vaṇijyaḥ sarve natvā taṃ sahasā kramāt /
XXbsu062_u:5291: hā kāntā priyabhartāsi māṃ vihāyādhunā katham /
XXbsu062_u:5292: niḥsneho mayi kutraika eva gantuṃ tvamicchasi //
XXbsu062_u:5296: hā kānta kathamekānte tyaktvā māṃ bhakticāriṇīim /
XXbsu062_u:5299: vismṛtaṃ bhavatā kānta tatsmṛtvā paśyemāṃ priyām //
XXbsu062_u:5301: tavāpyasmi priyā bhāryā tatkathaṃ nau viyogatā //

XXbsu062_u:7950: yaddevā viyati vimānavāsino 'nye nirdvandvāḥ samanubhavanti saumanasyam /
XXbsu062_u:7955: karmāgamādyathā pūrvaṃ sajjaḥ sarvatra ca tu te //
XXbsu062_u:7962: snehānna tyajyate loko lābhādiṣu ca tṛṣṇayā /
XXbsu062_u:7965: śamathaḥ prathamaṃ gaveṣaṇīyaḥ sa ca loke nirapekṣayabhiratyā //
XXbsu062_u:7967: yena janmasahastrāṇi draṣṭavyo na punaḥ priyaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:7968: apaśyannaratiṃ yāti samādhau na ca tiṣṭhati /
XXbsu062_u:7969: na ca tṛpyati dṛṣṭvāpi pūrvavadbādhate tṛṣā //
XXbsu062_u:7979: atha na śrūyate teṣāṃ kupitā yānti durgatim /
XXbsu062_u:7993: bodhyaṃgadānaṃ pradiśantiṃ sadbhyo dhyānaṃ hi tatra pravadanti hetum //
XXbsu062_u:7999: dhyānaṃ tatraikahetuṃ sakalaguṇanidhiṃ prāhuḥ sarve narendrāḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8006: imaṃ parikaraṃ sarvaṃ prajñārthaṃ hi jagaddhite /
XXbsu062_u:8014: lokena bhāvā dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8018: prajñādhanena vikulaṃ tu narasya rupamālekhya rupamiva sāravihīnamantaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8019: buddhayānvitasya falamiṣṭamudeti vīryādvīryaṃ hi buddhirahitaṃ svavadhāya śatruḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8021: madhyāntamādyapi janaḥ pravetti prajñābalaṃ tatkathayanti tajjñāḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8023: jñānālokaṃ karoti praharati ca sadādoṣavṛndaṃ narāṇām //
XXbsu062_u:8024: ādeṣṭā cendriyāṇāṃ paramanujamano vetti sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8026: kāryārṇave 'pi dṛḍhaṃ nimagnāḥ saṃgrāmamadhye manujāḥ pradhānāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8027: prajñāvaśātte vijayaṃ labhante prajñā hyataḥ sā śubhahetubhūtāḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8028: prajñābalenaiva jināḥ jayanti ghoraṃ suduṣṭaṃ ca mārasainyam /
XXbsu062_u:8029: prajñāviśeṣeṇa janā vibhānti prajñā hi khyātā jananī jinānām //
XXbsu062_u:8033: svargāpavargaguṇaratnanidhanabhūtā etāḥ ṣaḍeva bhuvi pāramitā narāṇām /
XXbsu062_u:8034: jñātvā naraḥ svahitasādhanatatparaḥ syātkuryādataḥ satatamāśu dṛḍhaṃ prayatnam //
XXbsu062_u:8052: teṣāmeva sadā bhadraṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvam /
XXbsu062_u:8067: atha te sāṃghikāḥ sarve ānandapramukhāḥ mudā /
XXbsu062_u:8078: jitvā māragaṇānarhan bodhiṃ prāpya jino bhaveḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8079: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8082: 20. phalaśrutiḥ atha bhūyaḥ sa rājendro bhūpo 'śokaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8089: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditam /
XXbsu062_u:8099: duḥkhāgnau patito yo 'pi smṛtvā lokeśvaraṃ bhajet /
XXbsu062_u:8106: tataḥ sa sahasottīrya smṛtvā dharmarato bhavet //
XXbsu062_u:8107: yadā ca vaṇijaḥ sārthā naukāruḍhā mahāmbudhau /
XXbsu062_u:8111: tadā teṣāṃ mahādhīraḥ smṛtvā lokeśvaraṃ namet /
XXbsu062_u:8113: tatastāḥ kālikā vātā na careyuḥ prasāditāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8114: tato nau savaṇiksārthā svasti ratnākaraṃ vrajet //
XXbsu062_u:8116: tatra te vaṇijaḥ sarve labdharatnāḥ pramoditāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8117: svasti pratyāgatāḥ svasti samiyuḥ svapuraṃ laghu //
XXbsu062_u:8120: yaśca duṣṭo vadhāt sṛṣṭo gṛhīto vadhyaghātakaiḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8123: tataste ghātakāḥ sarve taṃ hantuṃ nābhiśaknuyuḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8124: yadi vighātito daivāt tyaktvā pāpāśrayāṃ mṛtaḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8126: sarve yakṣāśca gandharvāḥ kumbhāṇḍā rākṣasā api /
XXbsu062_u:8127: kinnarā garuḍā nāgā bhūtāḥ pretāḥ piśācikāḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8137: tadā te dhūrtakāścaurāḥ sarve yāyuḥ parāṅmukhāḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8141: tadā sa vyādhito mukto nīrogī puṣṭitendriyaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8149: tadā sa śrīguṇotpanno bhavet sāadhuḥ śubhendriyaḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8161: tadā sa vijayan sarvān saṃsthāpayennije vaśe //
XXbsu062_u:8166: yo 'putraḥ putraratnārthī taṃ lokeśaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8172: vidyārthī labhate vidyāṃ dhanārthi labhate dhanam /
XXbsu062_u:8175: dravyārthī labhate dravyaṃ guṇārthī labhate guṇam /
XXbsu062_u:8176: bhogyārthī labhate bhojyaṃ gṛhārthī labhate gṛham //
XXbsu062_u:8187: yasya lokeśvare bhaktistasya pāpaṃ na kiṃcana /
XXbsu062_u:8189: sarve duṣṭagaṇā mārāḥ kṣīyante sarvataḥ sadā /
XXbsu062_u:8204: ye bhajanti sadā nityaṃ lokeśvaraṃ jagatprabhum /
XXbsu062_u:8205: teṣāṃ naiva bhayaṃ kiṃcitsarvatra sarvadāpi hi //
XXbsu062_u:8210: varuṇāśca hi rājāśca sarve vāyugaṇā api /
XXbsu062_u:8211: sarve śrīdādayo yakṣāḥ sarve bhūtādhipā api //
XXbsu062_u:8213: sarve siddhāśca sādhyāśca rudrā vidyādharā api //
XXbsu062_u:8224: tathā ca yoginaḥ siddhā avikalpā jitendriyāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8229: vaiṣṇavā api śaivāśca liṃgino vratino 'pi ca //
XXbsu062_u:8233: arhanto bhikṣavaścāpi dṛṣṭgā taṃ dūrato mudā /
XXbsu062_u:8249: durgatiṃ te na gacchinta kadācana kathaṃcana /
XXbsu062_u:8256: so 'pi na durgatiṃ yāti yāti sadgatimeva hi //
XXbsu062_u:8283: bhāvayet satataṃ smṛtvā dhyātvāpi praṇayen mudā //
XXbsu062_u:8294: sarvāḥ pāramitā devyaḥ sarve saṃghā jinātmajāḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8312: matvā taṃ trijagannāthaṃ bhajasva sarvadā smaran //
XXbsu062_u:8313: ye tasya śaraṇe sthitvā dhyātvā samāhitāḥ /
XXbsu062_u:8314: nāmāpi ca samuccārya bhajanti śraddhayā sadā //
XXbsu062_u:8316: kṛpādṛṣṭyā samālokya kṛtvā ceyuḥ śubhaṃ sadā //
XXbsu062_u:8324: tataḥ prabhṛti rājā sa lokeśaṃ sarvadā smaran /
XXbsu062_u:8325: dhyātvā nāma samuccārya prāabhajat pālayan prajāḥ //
XXbsu062_u:8326: tadā tasya narendrasya viṣaye tatra sarvadā /
XXbsu062_u:8334: eteṣāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ saṃbuddhāḥ sakalāḥ sadā /
XXbsu062_u:8341: tatra teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kurvantu maṃgalaṃ sadā //
XXbsu062_u:8361: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
XXbsu062_u:8362: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodhaṃ evaṃvādī mahaśramaṇaḥ //
